import React, { useRef, useContext } from "react"; import { ScrollMenu, VisibilityContext } from "react-horizontal-scrolling-menu"; function Section1(props) { const [scrollNext] = useContext(VisibilityContext); const [scrollPrev] = useContext(VisibilityContext); return (
scrollPrev()} style={{ fontSize: "100px" }}> {" < "}
} RightArrow={
scrollNext()}> {" > "}
} > ); } export default Section1;
